Cnut: Canute and Ælfgifu cropped (Canute).jpg | Contemporary portrait of King Cnut | from the New Minster | Liber Vitae | , 1031

King of Norway.Burial: Old Minster, Winchester, England. Bones now in Winchester Cathedral, Winchester, England
King of Norway.Spouse: Ælfgifu of Northampton | Emma of Normandy
King of Norway.Issue: Svein Knutsson | Harold Harefoot | Harthacnut | Gunhilda, Queen of the Germans
